author: Jeffrey Sparshott
title: Newsletter: Service-Sector Struggles
description: Your daily economics newsletter from The Wall Street Journal.
content: This is the web version of the WSJs newsletter on the economy. You can sign up for daily delivery here.Economic activity is crashing around the globe. IHS Markit's surveys of purchasing managers in Japan and Europe show overall activity plummeting in March, l… [+6691 chars]
